item.title: Sue add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Sue add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Sue add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sue add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Sue add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Sue add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid." -- John Wayne

item.title: Sue add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Sue add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "Seize the moment. Remember all those women on the 'Titanic' who waved off the dessert cart." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Sue add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Sue add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Sue add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "When beetles fight these battles in a bottle with their paddles and the bottle's on a poodle and the poodle's eating noodles... ...they call this a muddle puddle tweetle poodle beetle noodle bottle paddle battle." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sue add a quote by alice walker
item.description: "I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it." -- alice walker

item.title: Sue add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours" -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Sue add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook." -- Julia Child

item.title: Sue add a quote by Babe Ruth
item.description: "Every strike brings me closer to the next home run." -- Babe Ruth

item.title: Sue add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Sue add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sue add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Sue add a quote by Robin Williams
item.description: "See, the problem is that God gives men a brain and a penis, and only enough blood to run one at a time." -- Robin Williams

item.title: Sue add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Sue add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "What's another word for thesaurus?" -- Steven Wright

item.title: Sue add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Sue add a quote by Alice Roosevelt Longworth
item.description: "If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody come sit next to me." -- Alice Roosevelt Longworth

item.title: Sue add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A banker is a fellow who lends you his umbrella when the sun is shining, but wants it back the minute it begins to rain." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sue add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson
